vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φῐλ-ητός, ή, όν,
to be loved, worthy of love, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; τὰ φ. objects of love, [Refs]
__II adverb -τῶς in a friendly spirit, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.2.17
§ Philetus, "beloved"
Philetus, (Proper name), 2Tim. 2:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
腓理徒 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "受鍾愛的"
一名持異端邪說者, 許米乃的門徒 (提後 2:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
腓理徒 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "受钟爱的"
一名持异端邪说者, 许米乃的门徒 (提后 2:17)
